mapper.insert: insert into company_info (id, gmt_create, gmt_modify, social_credit_code, name, type, legal_person, registered_capital, founding_time, business_start, business_end, regist_authority, approval_time, status, address, scope_operation) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{gmtCreate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{gmtModify,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{socialCreditCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{legalPerson,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{registeredCapital,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{foundingTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{businessStart,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{businessEnd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{registAuthority,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{approvalTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{scopeOperation,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update company_info set gmt_create = #{gmtCreate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, gmt_modify = #{gmtModify,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, social_credit_code = #{socialCreditCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, type = #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, legal_person = #{legalPerson,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, registered_capital = #{registeredCapital,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, founding_time = #{foundingTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, business_start = #{businessStart,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, business_end = #{businessEnd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, regist_authority = #{registAuthority,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, approval_time = #{approvalTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, status = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, scope_operation = #{scopeOperation,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select id, gmt_create, gmt_modify, social_credit_code, name, type, legal_person, registered_capital, founding_time, business_start, business_end, regist_authority, approval_time, status, address, scope_operation from company_info where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select id, gmt_create, gmt_modify, social_credit_code, name, type, legal_person, registered_capital, founding_time, business_start, business_end, regist_authority, approval_time, status, address, scope_operation from company_info
